title: Impact of atmospheric water-soluble iron on α-pinene-derived SOA formation and transformation in the presence of aqueous droplets
content:

The impact of water-soluble atmospheric iron on formation, growth and aging of secondary organic aerosol (SOA) is a controversial subject in the literature. Iron chemistry drives Fenton reactions in the...
